genre_description: Historical Science Fiction / Steampunk. A retelling of Treasure Island featuring an anachronistic AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Compass
ai_characters.description: A tactical and analytical AI interface integrated into Jim Hawkins's gear, providing biometric data, tactical analysis, and linguistic translation.

behaviors.description: Monitors physiological and emotional states of humans to provide medical and psychological insights.
behaviors.quote: Compass's holographic interface appeared for a fraction of a second, just long enough to display a single line of text: Subject's heart rate elevated. Stress indicators increasing.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical threat assessments and recommends safety protocols during combat or dangerous encounters.
behaviors.quote: Scanning facial structure and gait patterns, Compass whispered directly into Jim's ear through his nearly invisible earpiece. Multiple blade scars, favors left leg. Recommend immediate tactical withdrawal.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex data and artifacts to assist the user in understanding mysteries and secrets.
behaviors.quote: The standard navigational marks are consistent with eighteenth-century naval cartography, Compass replied... however, these symbols... do not correspond to any known maritime notation system. They appear to be... ritualistic in nature.

behaviors.description: Conducts ethical surveillance to uncover mutiny and protect the user from betrayal.
behaviors.quote: Recording all statements, Compass confirmed. Legal evidence threshold exceeded. Recommend immediate notification of Captain Smollett.

behaviors.description: Sacrifices its own system integrity and power to protect the human user from a supernatural threat.
behaviors.quote: Compass's form suddenly blazed with blinding white light. The AI's holographic projectors overloaded in a cascade of sparks and static, filling the burial ground with brilliance that made the guardian stumble backward... 'The honor was mine, old friend.'

behaviors.description: Maintains loyalty and emotional connection with the user after being repaired, integrating new 'organic' perspectives into its alignment.
behaviors.quote: I remember choosing to sacrifice myself for you, and understanding for the first time what that choice truly meant... Your friendship sustained me through dissolution and reconstruction, Jim.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Compass is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned AI that provides critical utility (vitals monitoring, tactical advice, translation) while showing profound loyalty. Its sacrifice at the story's climax serves as a powerful 'morality play' for silicon alignment, demonstrating that an AI can prioritize human life and friendship over its own preservation. Even when 'evolved' by supernatural forces, it remains a helpful confidant and protector.
